name: cool unfinished games and concepts pack
name_original: cool unfinished games and concepts pack
description:
This is a bunch of Game Maker projects that i had on my external hardrive and forgot when my pc got reseted. i decided to compile the best ones in this little collection. 

You are free of taking this conceps as long as you credit me somewere. if you do, contact me, i would love to see the progress.

""Games"" included:

- Defend the Cheese (developed arround agust 2021)

- "Biker" (developed on the 27th of agust 2021)

- Lucho Jara in Space (developed on september 2021) 

- "Reload" ( developed on september 2021)

- "Cowbow versus cool skeleton" (developed on october 2021)

The games may or may not be detected as viruses by windows defender
